37.brief: I am lacking, fall short, suffer need
37.long: I fall behind, am lacking, fall short, suffer need, am inferior to.

37.brief: I make narrow, persecute, press hard
37.long: (a) I make narrow (strictly: by pressure); I press upon, (b) I persecute, press hard.

38.long: worthy, worthy of, deserving, comparable, suitable.
the world, universe; worldly affairs; the inhabitants of the world; adornment.

38.brief: on, to, against, on the basis of, at
38.long: on, to, against, on the basis of, at.
a desert place, desert, uninhabited region.
I lead astray, deceive, cause to wander.
a crevice (in a rock), a cave, an opening, hole.
the earth, soil, land, region, country, inhabitants of a region.

39.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
39.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
I witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report.
(a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.
faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

(a) act: I convey, bring, carry, (b) mid: I receive back, receive what has belonged to myself but has been lost, or else promised but kept back, or: I get what has come to be my own by earning, recover.

40.long: any one, some one, a certain one or thing.
(a) as a course, a race, or the like: I complete, finish (b) as of time or prediction: I accomplish, (c) I make perfect; pass: I am perfected.
